EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Chicago Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Chicago at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Tuesday, April 18, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 3:45pm
Location: 1871 222 W. Merchandise Mart Plaza, Suite 1212, Chicago, IL 60654 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1871/@41.888369,-87.6375527,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x880e2cb6fb22d371:0x40547b2a8f2c295!8m2!3d41.888369!4d-87.635364?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
